titles.title: To authorize the appointment of Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force (Retired), to the grade of major general on the retired list.
To authorize the appointment of Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force (Retired), to the grade of major general on the retired list.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: Authorizes the President to appoint Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force (retired), to the grade of major general on the Air Force retired list.
